name: docker-images
description: List Docker images on the host system with filtering options

examples.description: Show all images including intermediate layers

options.description: Show all images (default hides intermediate images)
Filter output based on conditions (can be used multiple times)
Pretty-print images using a Go template

filters: label=<key> or label=<key>=<value> - Filter by label
before=<image> - Filter images created before given image
since=<image> - Filter images created since given image
